ISSUE.TITLE: ProductService.ProductIsAvailable does not work correctly when dateTime argument is not specified
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: When the `dateTime` argument is not specified, it does not filter out products that are not available on the current date. For example, the following test fails: ``` [Test] public void Should_not_be_available_when_current_date_is_not_in_range() { var product = new Product { AvailableStartDateTimeUtc = DateTime.UtcNow.AddDays(-2), AvailableEndDateTimeUtc = DateTime.UtcNow.AddDays(-1) }; _productService.ProductIsAvailable(product).Should().BeFalse(); } ```
